channel.title: Search Engine Optimization(SEO) Mr SEO's Podcast
channel.description: Learn about search engine optimization (SEO) and SEM in this podcast. Everything you wanted to know about search engine optimization(SEO). Technorati Profile

channel.itunes:author: Greg Gaskill

item.title: Listener Questions
item.description: We cover how and when to monetize a site. Will selling links hurt your site? If you buy or sell links how you should go about doing so. ...and much more. For this and many other podcasts visit Mr-Seo.com For the code to save on Kewyword discovery vist our SEO blog

item.title: Link Building * PPC Common Problems * Site Exposure
item.description: Joe and Alan discuss PPC, Link Building and how to get more exposure that will help your overall SEO. Be sure to visit us Mr-Seo, and Blog
item.dc:creator: Greg Gaskill
item.itunes:summary: Joe and Alan discuss PPC, Link Building and how to get more exposure that will help your overall SEO. Be sure to visit us Mr-Seo, and Blog

item.title: Buying links under the radar. Debate on the criteria of hiring an SEO and much more.
item.description: Joe and Alan discuss the intricacies of buying links, how some companies fish for a free lunch and debate the criteria for hiring an SEO.
item.dc:creator: Greg Gaskill
item.itunes:summary: Joe and Alan discuss the intricacies of buying links, how some companies fish for a free lunch and debate the criteria for hiring an SEO.

item.title: Web 2.0 link building methods
item.description: Joe and Alan and talk about using social bookmarking to build links. We also go into the effectiveness of articles and other forms of link building. We talk about our new SEO radio show as well.
item.dc:creator: Greg Gaskill
item.itunes:summary: Joe and Alan and talk about using social bookmarking to build links. We also go into the effectiveness of articles and other forms of link building. We talk about our new SEO radio show as well.

item.title: Social Bookmarking, Media and more. Interview with Joe Whyte
item.description: I talk with Joe Whyte about SEO and Social bookmarking. We cover what is the best way to use web 2.0. We also talk about which social media sites work best for certain topics and much more. If you want to know more about social media you cannot afford to miss this podcast.
item.dc:creator: Greg Gaskill
item.itunes:summary: I talk with Joe Whyte about SEO and Social bookmarking. We cover what is the best way to use web 2.0. We also talk about which social media sites work best for certain topics and much more. If you want to know more about social media you cannot afford to miss this podcast.

item.title: Small Business Branding - Interview with Kevin Levy
item.description: I talk with Kevin Levy. We talk about business branding and how many people do it wrong. It doesn't matter how small your business is now, business branding is something you need to think about now.
item.dc:creator: Greg Gaskill
item.itunes:summary: I talk with Kevin Levy. We talk about business branding and how many people do it wrong. It doesn't matter how small your business is now, business branding is something you need to think about now.

item.title: Inside PPC tips revealed. Interview with Karl Ribas on PPC
item.description: I talk with Karl Ribas abut PPC tricks and methods. Karl had a lot of useful tips. Anyone who does any form of PPC MUST listen to this podcast.
item.dc:creator: Greg Gaskill
item.itunes:summary: I talk with Karl Ribas abut PPC tricks and methods. Karl had a lot of useful tips. Anyone who does any form of PPC MUST listen to this podcast.

item.title: Interview with anthony Muller
item.description:
I talk with Anthony Muller about user experience, a look inside the world of SEO, nightmare SEO clients, buying links, linkbaiting and much more.

To read more see our blog at http://www.mr-seo.com/wordpress/?p=195

item.description:
This is part two of the interview with Alan. If you enjoyed the first one, you'll love the second part of this.
Next week... I interview Anthony Muller. Subscribe now so you don't miss an episode.

item.itunes:summary:

item.title: Interview with Alan Rabinowitz of SEO Image
item.description:
I talk with Alan and cover a lot on SEO. Somethings we agree on and others we don't.

I ask Alan...

When is it a good time to hire an SEO company vs. an in house individual?

What is one of the most important factors to getting a site to rank well? On page? Links? PR?
What would you say is a common mistake made by novice SEO's
Should people focus on just optimizing for Google?
Buying links? Worth it? When is it worth it and when is it not?

... and much more. This is part one of a 2 part series.
item.dc:creator: Greg Gaskill
item.itunes:summary:
I talk with Alan and cover a lot on SEO. Somethings we agree on and others we don't.
I ask Alan...
When is it a good time to hire an SEO company vs. an in house individual?
What is one of the most important factors to getting a site to rank well? On page? Links? PR?
What would you say is a common mistake made by novice SEO's
Should people focus on just optimizing for Google?
Buying links? Worth it? When is it worth it and when is it not?
... and much more. This is part one of a 2 part series.

item.title: Types of links - Local Search - Podcamp NYC
item.description: Local search. Is it worth optimizing organically for. Links - what types of links are there. Which links do what and how they effect your optimization.

item.itunes:summary: Local search. Is it worth optimizing organically for. Links - what types of links are there. Which links do what and how they effect your optimization.

item.title: What should you do while you wait for your SEO to kick-in?
item.description: This podcast is based on my most recent Article There are things you can do while you are waiting for your SEO efforts to kick in. All of these methods will also aid you in your SEO goals. Mr SEO is a proud supporter of PodCampNYC Check out this FREE advent in NYC April 6 - 7 See the site for More Details

item.description:

Why have my pages all of a sudden gone supplemental?
Google adsense has launched new TOS and much more

item.title: Listeners Questions 2007
item.description:
Joe and Sequita tackle listeners questions and problems.

Some of the questions we answered were:

I read having anchor text is important on a site when describing other pages. Is this correct? What is the best way to do that?

I want to put my product descriptions in a pop-up window, is that bad for SEO?

My company has been doing link exchanges for over a year now, but our rankings have not improved. What are we doing wrong?

..and much more. You can also read the answers to these questions on my blog http://www.mr-seo.com/blog/2007/01/q-and-with-mr-seo.html

item.title: Most frequently asked question and mistakes about SEO and web design
item.description:
We revisit this and cover some common mistakes with newbies when building a site. We also cover myths and what most people may not know when optimizing a website. We also touch on XML sitemaps and talk about the video cast.
Watch a supporting video cast here http://www.mr-seo.com/Common-SEO-Mistakes.html
item.dc:creator: Greg Gaskill
item.itunes:summary:

item.title: Mr SEO first Video Cast - How to create and submit an XML sitemap using free tools
item.description:
After 1 year of offer an excellent SEO podcast we are now taking it one step further. This is the first SEO video cast. Please email me comments and suggestions. We will do our best to bring you the best video cast on search engine optimization. The size of the podcast will seem small on podomatic. It should be fine on itunes. You can also download video casts on our site www.mr-seo.com

Show notes:

Information on XML sitemaps

Please note that the Sitemap Protocol supplements, but does not replace, the crawl-based mechanisms that search engines already use to discover URLs. By submitting a Sitemap (or Sitemaps) to a search engine, you will help that engine's crawlers to do a better job of crawling your site.

Using this protocol does not guarantee that your web pages will be included in search indexes. (Note that using this protocol will not influence the way your pages are ranked by Google.)

Can I use an XML sitemap as a substitution for a robot.txt file?

No, you must still use a robots.txt file to restricted the engines from pages and folders you do not want them to index.

Will submitting an XML sitemap increase my pagerank?

No, it will not. An XML sitemap has nothing to do with pagerank.

Will submitting a sitemap get me out of the sandbox or supplemental index?

No, it will not. Submitting a sitemap will not help you with either of these problems

I've submitted a sitemap and may site is still not being fully crawled. Why?

There could be other factors involved. Check your sites navigation. Make sure all your links are accessible and spiderable.

To generate a sitemap go to http://www.xml-sitemaps.com/

http://www.sitemapdoc.com/


To upload your file to your server you can use an FTP program such as FileZilla

It's free http://www.download.com/FileZilla/3000-2160_4-10308966.html


Submit a sitemap to Yahoo http://siteexplorer.search.yahoo.com/


Submit a sitemap to Google www.google.com/webmasters/sitemaps/
